item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - TRAXSOURCE NU DISCO / INDIE DANCE TOP 100 JUNE 2024
item.description:
data: 2024-06-24
TOTAL: 108
GENRE: Nu Disco / Indie Dance

Nu Disco / Indie Dance Top 100 June 2024 features a vibrant selection of tracks that blend disco grooves with modern electronic elements. From soulful vocals to funky basslines, this chart showcases the best in dance music. Notable releases include “Moodena’s Message” by Moodena, “I Got A Song For You” by Chemars, and “How You Feel” by ANOTR, Erik Bandt, and Leven Kali. These tunes capture the essence of the genre, making them essential for any dancefloor.
